CustomField.formula: Work_Order__r.WorkType.Name = "Stray" && Work_Order__r.Conference__r.Company__r.Name = "US Duty" && ( ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + 1) >= DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + 1)),3,14) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + 1)),3,14) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + 1) < DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + 1)),11, 7) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + 1)),11, 7) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) && NOW() >= (DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) & " 13:40:00") + 1) ) || NOW() >= (DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) & " 14:40:00") + 1) )
CustomField.label: PPS Stray
